content:
Hi all, I thought it might be rude to post this PR without saying something here: https://github.com/rust-lang/team/pull/441

I wish I could have been a bit more helpful than I was, but I'm glad I was able to contribute as much as I did. I'm not leaving the Rust project or anything like that (I'm still part of wg-governance and am still leading project-ffi-unwind), I just don't think it makes sense for me to have the various permissions that come with official membership in this team.
can relate to that feeling but personally i think it's fine to have a few extra members on the team, you never know when it's useful :smile: Anyway, thanks for all the help :smile:
